summary: A small modification to LC_immersive Looting mod that fixes names for further immersion.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][font=Georgia][size=5]LC_Immersive Looting Names Fix[/size][/font]

[size=3]Des[/size][/b][/size][size=4][b][size=3]cription[/size][size=3]
[/size][/b][size=3]This mod changes [u]only[/u] the name of enchantments, amulets and eggs for further immersion.[/size][size=3]
See images for more informations.

[b]Installation[/b]
Just unzip the file in your Skyrim/Data folder and overwrite the original .esp file.
[/size][b][size=3]
Requirments
[/size][/b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44106/?][font=Georgia]LC_immersive Looting[/font][/url] by Locaster[b].[/b][/size][b][size=3]

Compatibilities
[/size][/b][size=3]This mod is compatible with anything as long as it does [u]NOT MODIFY[/u] the original version of the mod.[/size][b][size=3]

[/size][/b][size=3]It works with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59117/?]LC_Immersive Looting enchantmnents[/url] too, but you will see changes only in dragon eggs since
that mod overwrite the original data.
[/size][b][size=3]
Credits
[/size][/b][i][size=3]Bethesda Softworks for Skyrim
Locaster for [font=Georgia]LC_immersive Looting[/font][/size][/i][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][i][size=3]ElministerAU for Tes5Edit[/size][/i][/size]
author: Borgiak
